languages.text: {n}Калькасар предупреждающе поднимает руку.{/n} "И прошу, не утомляйте меня пояснениями, что он "не погиб, а пропал без вести". Молчание Хейнрикса говорит о том, что он либо мертв, либо в плену — что тоже означает, что он уже мертв. А значит, возвращает нас к моему вопросу — как же так вышло?"

{n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "And please, save me your quibbling about whether he is dead or merely missing. Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Калькасар предупреждающе поднимает руку.{/n} "И прошу, не утомляйте меня пояснениями, что он "не погиб, а пропал без вести". Молчание Хейнрикса говорит о том, что он либо мертв, либо в плену — что тоже означает, что он уже мертв. А значит, возвращает нас к моему вопросу — как же так вышло?"

Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

{n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "And please, save me your quibbling about whether he is dead or merely missing. Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎举起一只手，以示警告。{/n}“还有，别再和我争论他究竟是死了，还是只是失踪了。冯·卡洛克斯没有联系过我，这说明他要么是死了，要么是被人囚禁了。也就是说，他和死了没什么区别。因此，我又要回到我最初的问题了——这一切究竟是怎么发生的？”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "And please, save me your quibbling about whether he is dead or merely missing. Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎举起一只手，以示警告。{/n}“还有，别再和我争论他究竟是死了，还是只是失踪了。冯·卡洛克斯没有联系过我，这说明他要么是死了，要么是被人囚禁了。也就是说，他和死了没什么区别。因此，我又要回到我最初的问题了——这一切究竟是怎么发生的？”

languages.text: {n}Calcazar levanta la mano a modo de advertencia.{/n} «Y por favor, ahórrese la disputa sobre si está muerto o desaparecido. La falta de contacto de van Calox indica que si no está muerto está prisionero, que prácticamente viene a ser lo mismo. Así que vuelvo a mi pregunta original: ¿Cómo ha podido pasar esto?».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "And please, save me your quibbling about whether he is dead or merely missing. Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar levanta la mano a modo de advertencia.{/n} «Y por favor, ahórrese la disputa sobre si está muerto o desaparecido. La falta de contacto de van Calox indica que si no está muerto está prisionero, que prácticamente viene a ser lo mismo. Así que vuelvo a mi pregunta original: ¿Cómo ha podido pasar esto?».

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは警告の合図に手を挙げる。{/n}「それと、死んでいるにせよ失踪しただけにせよ、どうか言い逃れはしてくれるな。ヴァン・カロックスは連絡不足だから、死んでいるとも捕らわれているともとれる。どんな状態でも似たようなものだろう。さて、当初の質問に戻る…なぜこのような事態に？」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "And please, save me your quibbling about whether he is dead or merely missing. Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは警告の合図に手を挙げる。{/n}「それと、死んでいるにせよ失踪しただけにせよ、どうか言い逃れはしてくれるな。ヴァン・カロックスは連絡不足だから、死んでいるとも捕らわれているともとれる。どんな状態でも似たようなものだろう。さて、当初の質問に戻る…なぜこのような事態に？」

languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "And please, save me your quibbling about whether he is dead or merely missing. Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

languages.text: {n}Calcazar erhebt warnend eine Hand.{/n} "Und bitte erspart mir Eure Ausflüchte, ob er tot ist oder lediglich verschollen. Die Funkstille seitens van Calox legt nahe, dass er entweder tot ist oder in Gefangenschaft, was bedeutet, er ist so gut wie tot. Und damit kehre ich zu meiner ursprünglichen Frage zurück – wie ist das passiert?"
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "And please, save me your quibbling about whether he is dead or merely missing. Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar erhebt warnend eine Hand.{/n} "Und bitte erspart mir Eure Ausflüchte, ob er tot ist oder lediglich verschollen. Die Funkstille seitens van Calox legt nahe, dass er entweder tot ist oder in Gefangenschaft, was bedeutet, er ist so gut wie tot. Und damit kehre ich zu meiner ursprünglichen Frage zurück – wie ist das passiert?"

languages.text: {n}Calcazar lève une main en guise d'avertissement.{/n} « Et je vous prierai de m'épargner toute spéculation sur sa disparition. Si van Calox n'a pas repris contact, c'est qu'il est soit mort, soit prisonnier, auquel cas je ne donne pas cher de sa peau. J'en reviens donc à ma question : que s'est-il passé ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "And please, save me your quibbling about whether he is dead or merely missing. Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar lève une main en guise d'avertissement.{/n} « Et je vous prierai de m'épargner toute spéculation sur sa disparition. Si van Calox n'a pas repris contact, c'est qu'il est soit mort, soit prisonnier, auquel cas je ne donne pas cher de sa peau. J'en reviens donc à ma question : que s'est-il passé ? »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, tek elini uyarı niteliğinde kaldırıyor.{/n} "Lütfen ölümünün şaibeli olduğu, yalnızca kaybolmuş olabileceği konusundaki kaçamak yanıtlarını bir kenara bırak. Van Calox'un benimle irtibata geçmemiş olması ya öldüğünün ya da tutsak tutulduğunun işaretidir ki tutsak ise zaten ölü demektir. Asıl soruma geri dönüyorum: Bu nasıl oldu?"
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "And please, save me your quibbling about whether he is dead or merely missing. Van Calox's lack of contact indicates that he is either dead or being held captive, which means he is as good as. And so I return to my original question — how did this happen?"

Van Calox'un benimle irtibata geçmemiş olması ya öldüğünün ya da tutsak tutulduğunun işaretidir, ki tutsak ise de zaten öldü demektir. Asıl soruma geri dönüyorum: Bu nasıl oldu?"
